verses.roman:
śrī-caitanya, nityānanda, advaita,--tina jana
śrīvāsa-gadādhara-ādi yata bhakta-gaṇa

synonyms: śrī-caitanya, nityānanda, advaita—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, Nityānanda Prabhu and Advaita Prabhu; tina—these three; jana—personalities; śrīvāsa-gadādhara—Śrīvāsa and Gadādhara; ādi—etc.; yata—all; bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees.
translation: While chanting the Pañca-tattva mahā-mantra, one must chant the names of Śrī Caitanya, Nityānanda, Advaita, Gadādhara and Śrīvāsa with their many devotees. This is the process.
